item.title: Exam Paper Examples
item.description: Cognition and Communication General Pointers ‚òù. Please have a look at Tylen’s guide for good reports by following this link: https://drive.google.com/.../1bo1kjdBGXPphYHrShMQ.../view…. It will help you know to structure your document ‚ù§ Some of you had switched around discussions and conclusions, others forgot to state their hypotheses, and so on. I believe this guide will be really helpful for a lot of you! üíó ü§ò. Remember to add your names in the header, as well as page numbers.

item.title: Helpful Links
item.description: Links to study relevant links AU Studypedia Checklist for new students Get timetables for courses Academic regulations Academic regulations (da)

item.title: International Exhange
item.description: ITTU ITTU is the Bachelor degree’s 5th semester elective (15 ECTS) during the Bachelor’s thesis and the exhange 6th semester (30 ECTS) where international exhange is possible. Information Process Apply at AU with a prioritized list (~5 prioritized universities, see ITTU files) Get the list accepted Apply at target university, possibly get accepted If not accepted, go to next university or if the list is exhausted, go to step 1 It’s mostly pretty tough work.

item.title: International Exhange
item.description: Guide to IV courses This page will guide you through the (often convoluted) process of applying for IV-courses outside fo Pre Approval Find you dream course (you can look here for some excellent cog-reviews) Actually find multiple ones and kill all the birds with one application stone NB: Some of the people at the administration are a bit touchy about you not using your pre-approval - so only find stuff courses you actually wanna take!
